nodes.text: The Caladarians were a social group who had representatives in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic. In order to view the reactions of various factions, including the Caladarians, the Sith Lord Darth Sidious, whose public persona was Senator Palpatine of Naboo, organized the proposal of a taxation bill, which he intended to fail. The bill failed as Sidious had planned, and he was able to learn whom the Caladarians' faction were willing to sacrifice.
